metadata.title: Hoven Highway Sunglasses
features: STAINLESS STEEL HINGES, BLACK METAL ICONS
description: Thunder your top-down all the way to Vegas with your lawyer and a suitcase well-stocked with all the medicine a proper road trip requires. Last, and certainly not least, throw on the Hoven Highway Sunglasses and make tracks. These stunning sunnies don't need to pretend to be stone-cold killers. On the proper dome, Hoven's UV protection and classic road-inspired frames know how to push the limits of sanity and still get the story. Impact-resistant lenses won't save you from paranoid hallucinations, but they won't shatter when two ape-sized bouncers throw you face first out of the Golden Nugget.
